website_summaries.verdict: If you want to turn yourself into Christmas present at a party, it's sure to get you noticed, but you'll have to take extra care when washing it.
pros: With a large gold bow, traditional Christmas colors, and a gift tag, this unique sweater is made to look like a Christmas gift
cons: The tacky bow that makes this sweater unique makes it difficult to wash
Bow material is prone to fraying

customer_reviews.title: Cheap knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I thought I was getting. The general idea is there, but that's about it. The sizing was baggy, the elbow pads are missing, as well as the bow wrap around the back, and the to-from card. Basically it's a cheap knock off of the actual sweater. The tags did say that it was from Tipsy Elves, so not sure if this was a misfit sweater or what, buy definitely returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Planning to Win Next Ugly Christmas Sweater Contest
customer_reviews.text: I tried on the sweater to see how it fit and how it felt. The fit was just right. I ordered the small. I am petite, 4'11 and 110 pounds. The sleeve length is just right for my arms. The material felt comfortable on my skin. Most important, the sweater is so adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Janell

customer_reviews.title: Cutest most obnoxious Christmas sweater ... I love it.
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the photo - perfect. Fits slightly larger than I anticipated - a little baggy on me, I'm 5'2' and weigh in at 140 so I would have been better off with a small.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Fun sweater, but wish it was better quality
customer_reviews.text: The sweater stood out at the ugly sweater party, but not good quality for price paid. It frayed at the elbow pads on the first wear without washing or rubbing against anything. The gold thread was very frayed by the end of the night, sticking out obviously from the sweater. And not sure it would even be possible to wash this given the materials, so it seems like a one use item.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product for the price! My wife got a few sizes larger in hopes of it being longer (to wear with leggings) but unfortunately the sweater just got wider, not longer. This was fine with her and the product is great. But it's worth noting this. If you think going up a size will make it longer, it won't.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Finally.. An Adorable XS Sweater That Fits!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and adorable sweater, definitely looks high quality! It is unique and I received several complements. I am 5'1 and usually wear a 0/00 and purchased the XS. I would say it is true to size and fits on the slim size, not a baggy fit like some sweaters which is great for my frame. I have not washed it yet, so I am not sure about the durability and or long term use of the sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: After this sweater was finally delivered (they wouldn’t leave it on the doorstep for whatever reason), it was perfect for my Christmas party! Excellent, thick fabric and still breathable. Just be careful that the seams are secure because I had one run on me and had to do emergency sewing!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sweater definitely not cheaply made. Wore it to an ugly sweater party and it was a hit. I am 5’9” 165lbs and normally buy lg this fit loose I would have been good with a medium but it all worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, high quality sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! It's very well made, not cheap at all. The blue elbow pads are velvet! I cant' wait to wear this!
customer_reviews.author: AJH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Went to a Christmas party and was the star of the show with this sweater
customer_reviews.author: Shanice L

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This sweater was delivered not as described. It did not have the elbow pads or the gold banding on the back. So essentially I paid $50 for and item that is very cheaply made not as described and not worth the money!! I could of bought same thing at tj maxx for 16.99
customer_reviews.author: Jason J Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Oh my lanta! This is the cutest sweater ever and it fits great! It's so comfy and warm but not uncomfortably hot
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this sweater!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sweater! Very well made, thick fabric. It’s actually pretty heavy, I was surprised. Received so many compliments! The inserted name card wipes off easily so you can change the To: From: Loved that!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too big
customer_reviews.text: The size chart was slightly misleading; however, super cute sweater. I saw a lady with this sweater on a cooking show and wanted one for myself. I just wish it would have fit to wear out for others to have the reaction I had when I first saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute sweater
customer_reviews.text: The color and quality was nice. However, the bow stitches were coming apart before i even wore it. I had to use safety pin to keep it up. Also, there wasn't a to-from card like displayed in the photo. I ordered a medium. Fit comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Antiniece

customer_reviews.title: Order with caution
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with the sweater, did not come with the blue elbow pads & the stitches on half of the bow are ripped. Although the fit and quality of the sweater is good, I will be returning because of it being ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Cutest ugly Christmas sweater
customer_reviews.text: The sweater makes you look like you’re the gift, from the big golden bow to the name tag and I really love the velvet patches on the elbows. I wore this sweater to work and I got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: darlisajohnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Sleeves were nice and long, could have gone a size smaller, but it was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Cute & practical
customer_reviews.text: I got so many compliments on this for Christmas! It’s cute but doubles as an ugly Christmas sweater
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute! Was worried if I should go up ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Was worried if I should go up to a Medium or stick with a small based on measurements and the small fit perfectly. Wore with royal blue Spanxx velvet leggings for an ugly sweater party.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 to 2 sizes up.
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered a large sweater for my daughter. She normally wears a small. Im glad i did because the large fit her great. The name tag plastic was torn so they are shipping another one out.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Cox

customer_reviews.title: More cute than ugly
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, fist somewhat small from average sizes, but very accurate to how it fits the model in thhe image. Would buy again or recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kennedy-Brol

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks okay from far away, but the material was thin and cheap. The ribbon’s edges looked like a bad scissor job. Not worth $40 for the quality of the sweater
customer_reviews.author: Cristian May

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is she can only wear it once a year.
customer_reviews.author: Rainier Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: My best Amazon Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: You will NOT be disappointed with this sweater! It is VERY well made, wonderful quality, and overall lovely!. I am 5ft 115lbs and ordered a small. It fits great. A medium would be a little too baggy so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Kacee Claybon

customer_reviews.title: Cute but does run big
customer_reviews.text: It’s such a cute sweater for a Christmas party. I followed the sizing that was given and the sweater turned out to be too big on me. Unfortunately, I had to send it back. 😞 I will definitely order from you again. The shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and comfy sweater
customer_reviews.text: Wore this to 2 xmas parties. Got lots of compliments and it is super comfortable. Bow is not sewn on very well. Loosely tacked down. Had to pin it with safety pins.
customer_reviews.author: k wickham

customer_reviews.title: Festive
customer_reviews.text: I was the hit at our company's ugly sweater day.
customer_reviews.author: patlou

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a very fun sweater but full of snags. Looks like it's used
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Attebery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sweatee
customer_reviews.text: I loved this Christmas sweater and it came in right on time
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lou

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sweater and quality is good however when it arrived the bow stitching was off so half of the bow is attached and the other half is not-Who late to send back...... bummer
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweater! Very well made, and very comfy. True to size and so cute.
customer_reviews.author: emjeter

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Clever, Runs slightly big
customer_reviews.text: Cute sweater! Got lots of compliments. Fits a little bigger than expected. If it wasn’t for the hilariously gaudy To:/From: name tag that it comes with, it would actually be really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Christmas sweater that I liked enough to purchase. Everyone liked it. I wore it with white jeans like the model.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Greer

customer_reviews.title: Small and tight fitting
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Medium - after reading reviews, was very tight and small still. Definitely size two up
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Keller

customer_reviews.title: 5’9 160 M - Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Loved my sweater. It really cute on. I fit perfectly. I didn’t want it baggy so I went with a medium. Wore skinny jeans and boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! The sweater is perfect for the holiday season! Love it and cannot wait until to wear it to my holiday luncheon!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Really cute sweater , didn’t have any seam issues and I won a Christmas sweater contest !
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Denison

customer_reviews.title: Go by your exact size. XL would have fit 16 to 18
customer_reviews.text: Well made and looks exactly like picture. It was way too big! I wear 16 to 18 and to be sure it was not too small I ordered the XXL. The XL would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Miss GG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sweater
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is well-made. It laundered very well. I washed it with woolite and on delicate then air-dried. It was super cute with gold leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Jane DeAses

customer_reviews.title: I bought in Medium; I'm 5'3" and 125lbs. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought in Medium; I'm 5'3" and 125lbs. I was hoping that a Medium would be a little more loose and long, but unfortunately that wasn't the case. Regardless, the sweater is really cute, but ugly! I won the ugly sweater contest with this.
customer_reviews.author: CHAN!

customer_reviews.title: Sweater was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this sweater. Perfect balance of ugly (gawky) and still cute! Wore it to work and got so many compliments! Plus Ryan Reynolds also wore this sweater 😄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute - but size down
customer_reviews.text: Measurement was incorrect. I measured for an XL and had to return for M. Super quick delivery, though. We loved our Christmas photo this year!
customer_reviews.author: ELLI Gildnes

customer_reviews.title: Love my sweater
customer_reviews.text: Love my sweater!!!! I wear a small and I have small arms and the sweater is a little snug on them... Overall a very comfy fit..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_shopper200

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love this sweater! Came just as pictured. Fit true to size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: The cutest "ugly" sweater! It was a big hit at a party and I paired it with gold shiny leggings
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Irene

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ the sweater cannot wait to wear it next ...
customer_reviews.text: Love ❤️ the sweater cannot wait to wear it next year perfect for the party I bought it for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fun all rolled into one great holiday sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B

customer_reviews.title: Runs very very large
customer_reviews.text: Even though the package was marked as womens, when opened it was as large as a men's size. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is sooo cute! Runs a little big but even big still looks cute!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Gegner

customer_reviews.title: Nice sweater
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, warm sweater. I got a lot of compliments at a party I wore it to.
customer_reviews.author: bally2cute

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product was very good quality, fit well. Used for work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and simply adorable
customer_reviews.text: I cant wait to wear this sweater, was everything I expected. Great quality and simply adorable.
customer_reviews.author: LISA MARIOTTI

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered large it was to big. It’s cute and a hit on Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable. Quality sweater, not just a cheap gag purchase. Large runs true to size. I wear a 12-14. I originally ordered an XL, because these things often run so small. The XL was huge on me.
customer_reviews.author: KW Juls

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fits like it should, ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: Bow looks exactly like the picture! I was worried it would look cheap or be crumpled, but it’s adorable, full, and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Jo Rader

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible looks ugly feels ugly nothing like what the pic showed to much money spent for crap
customer_reviews.author: virginia Towers

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I like the sweater, seems to be decent quality but it is EXTREMELY short.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.text: OMG, the quality of the sweater is far beyond what I expected. It is so well made, so cute, so funny, I love it, the elbow patches are beautiful blue velvet, the bow is attached--I thought I would have to tie the bow each time, the ribbon is on the back as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha N.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with great quality and people love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, people loved it at the ugly sweater parties that I went to! The bow isn't too bulky or uncomfortable. The sweater is very comfortable and not an itchy material.
customer_reviews.author: Duluth MN Girl

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Super festive
customer_reviews.text: Fit: It fits fantastically! I was so worried it would be too small, seeing as most 2X sweaters are too small for me. But it's perfect. Even after a wash or two. Fabric: It's super soft and comfortable. Perfect for wearing anytime. I live in SoCal and was worried it would be too hot after a while, but it wasn't too bad. Colors: Just as bright and vivid as shown, even in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Romance Grxxms

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but sleeves too short
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful sweater, and I would love to keep it. The Torso fits but the sleeves are too short. It would probably fit someone average but I'm fairly tall. Sorry I have to return it
customer_reviews.author: Teena P

customer_reviews.title: Love this sweater!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sweater. Definitely a conversation starter. Made of very good fabric and not itchy. I was worried about the gold bow fading after wash, but it didn’t. Highly recommend for ugly sweater holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Rie N.

customer_reviews.title: It’s really cute and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sweater for an ugly sweater Christmas party but it is really cute so it did not qualify as an ugly sweater. I received lots of compliments. The quality is really good. I would refer this sweater to a friend. I love my sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Score points for grandma.
customer_reviews.text: This was a request from my 15 year old granddaughter. She like it very much. Score points for grandma.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made sweater and is super cute and fun for sweater parties!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: ... received a lot of compliments that it was their favorite ugly
customer_reviews.text: I received a lot of compliments that it was their favorite ugly sweater
customer_reviews.author: Beth Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is sturdy and good quality. I would have to say it is a bit expensive. Other than that, it’s great as an ugly Christmas sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Moua

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! So tacky in the best way possible
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size!!!!! Great quality! So tacky in the best way possible!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This sweater is fantastic! I wasn't sure about the quality but I ...
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is fantastic! I wasn't sure about the quality but I was pleasantly surprised. It's slim fitting, I recommend going up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

product_meta.title: Tipsy Elves Women's Sweater - Cute Wrapping Paper Christmas Sweater
product_meta.description: You make the prefect Christmas Gift! This Tipsy Elves Christmas Present Christmas sweater is the perfect outfit for any Ugly Christmas Sweater party or get together!
feature_bullets: ****Christmas Flash Sale! Price Drop Valid Today Only!****
Extremely soft and high quality - will not shrink or itch. Our Christmas sweaters are made with high quality double-panel construction with reinforced seams. Machine washable and built to last.
All our products ship within 1-business day and same day when placed before 1pm PST, Guaranteed. 100% Acrylic
All ugly sweaters are brand new.
Tipsy Elves Christmas Sweaters are perfect for your Ugly Christmas Sweater party, holiday pub crawls, the ski cabin, and they always make a great gift!
